hibernate-mapping.query: from FileDownloadInfo as fileDownloadInfo where fileDownloadInfo.address = ? AND fileDownloadInfo.irFileId = ? AND fileDownloadInfo.downloadDate = ?

select sum(fileDownloadInfo.downloadCount) from FileDownloadInfo fileDownloadInfo where fileDownloadInfo.irFileId = ? and NOT exists(select 'x' from IgnoreIpAddress as ignore where fileDownloadInfo.address = ignore.address)

select fileDownloadInfo from FileDownloadInfo fileDownloadInfo where exists (select 'x' from IgnoreIpAddress as ignore where fileDownloadInfo.address = ignore.address) order by fileDownloadInfo.address, fileDownloadInfo.downloadDate desc
delete from FileDownloadInfo fileDownloadInfo where exists(select 'x' from IgnoreIpAddress as ignore where fileDownloadInfo.address = ignore.address and ignore.storeCounts = false)
select count(*) from FileDownloadInfo fileDownloadInfo where exists(select 'x' from IgnoreIpAddress as ignore where fileDownloadInfo.address = ignore.address)

select new edu.ur.ir.statistics.IpDownloadCount (fileDownloadInfo.address, sum(fileDownloadInfo.downloadCount)) from FileDownloadInfo fileDownloadInfo group by fileDownloadInfo.address order by sum(fileDownloadInfo.downloadCount) asc
select count(distinct fileDownloadInfo.address ) from FileDownloadInfo fileDownloadInfo

select new edu.ur.ir.statistics.IpDownloadCount (fileDownloadInfo.address, sum(fileDownloadInfo.downloadCount)) from FileDownloadInfo fileDownloadInfo group by fileDownloadInfo.address order by sum(fileDownloadInfo.downloadCount) desc
